p: The essential oil of Croton zehntneri Pax et Hoffm. inhibited the growth of Shigella flexneri, S. aureus, E. coli and Streptococcus β -haemolyticus in the susceptibility test of antibacterial activity. Regarding the MIC, the oil only demonstrated significant activity for S. flexneri at concentrations of 1000, 500, 100 and 50 μg/mL, with a MIC equal to 50 μg/mL (Costa et al. 2008).
